# Abstract Templates

This file contains reusable abstract content in different lengths for various publication formats.

## 25-Word Abstract (Twitter/Social Media)
```{.callout-note}
**Target:** Social media, elevator pitch
**Length:** 25 words max
```

::: {#abstract-25w}
{{< var study.title-short >}} reveals {{< var study.key-finding >}} through {{< var study.method-brief >}}, demonstrating {{< var study.impact-brief >}} with {{< var study.significance >}}.
:::

## 50-Word Abstract (Conference Submission)
```{.callout-note}
**Target:** Conference abstracts, brief summaries
**Length:** 50 words max
```

::: {#abstract-50w}
**Background:** {{< var study.background-brief >}}

**Methods:** {{< var study.methods-brief >}} 

**Results:** {{< var study.results-brief >}}

**Conclusions:** {{< var study.conclusions-brief >}}
:::

## 150-Word Abstract (Journal Standard)
```{.callout-note}
**Target:** Most journal submissions
**Length:** 150 words max
```

::: {#abstract-150w}
**Background:** {{< var study.background >}} {{< var study.problem-statement >}} {{< var study.research-gap >}}

**Objective:** {{< var study.objective >}}

**Methods:** {{< var study.design >}} {{< var study.participants >}} {{< var study.procedures >}} {{< var study.analysis >}}

**Results:** {{< var study.main-findings >}} {{< var study.key-statistics >}} {{< var study.secondary-findings >}}

**Conclusions:** {{< var study.implications >}} {{< var study.limitations >}} {{< var study.future-directions >}}

**Keywords:** {{< var study.keywords >}}
:::

## 300-Word Abstract (Extended/Detailed)
```{.callout-note}
**Target:** Detailed conference abstracts, grant applications
**Length:** 300 words max
```

::: {#abstract-300w}
**Background and Rationale:** {{< var study.background-detailed >}} {{< var study.literature-context >}} {{< var study.theoretical-framework >}} {{< var study.research-questions >}}

**Objectives:** {{< var study.primary-objective >}} {{< var study.secondary-objectives >}} {{< var study.hypotheses >}}

**Methods:** {{< var study.study-design >}} {{< var study.setting >}} {{< var study.participants-detailed >}} {{< var study.inclusion-criteria >}} {{< var study.procedures-detailed >}} {{< var study.measures >}} {{< var study.statistical-analysis >}}

**Results:** {{< var study.participant-characteristics >}} {{< var study.primary-outcomes >}} {{< var study.secondary-outcomes >}} {{< var study.subgroup-analyses >}} {{< var study.effect-sizes >}}

**Conclusions and Implications:** {{< var study.main-conclusions >}} {{< var study.clinical-implications >}} {{< var study.policy-implications >}} {{< var study.research-implications >}} {{< var study.study-limitations >}} {{< var study.future-research >}}

**Trial Registration:** {{< var study.registration >}}

**Keywords:** {{< var study.keywords-extended >}}
:::

## Usage Instructions

To use these abstracts in your documents:

1. **Include in YAML header:**
   ```yaml
   includes:
     in-header: shared-content/core-content/abstracts/_abstracts.qmd
   ```

2. **Reference in document:**
   ```markdown
   {{< include shared-content/core-content/abstracts/_abstracts.qmd#abstract-150w >}}
   ```

3. **Define variables in `_variables.yml`:**
   ```yaml
   study:
     title-short: "Brief study title"
     key-finding: "Main discovery"
     method-brief: "analysis method"
   ```
